typeSystemDescription.name: TestElementTypeSystem
typeSystemDescription.description: Type System descriptor defined for the TestElementAnnotation Step.

typeDescription.name: edu.cmu.lti.deiis.hw1.type.QAEntityList
typeDescription.description: a list of QAEntity objects. If a raw input file has more that one entity, we will have corresponding number of QAEntity in this object.

featureDescription.name: qaEntityList
featureDescription.description: a list of Question objects with respect to the raw input dataset. Note that each Question object has zero or more Answer objects.
